publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7946 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to the Egyptian People—That the Parliament congratulates the Egyptian people on what it sees as their bravery in bringing an end to the 30-year Mubarak regime and their fight for democracy, freedom of expression and an improvement to their daily life and calls on Britain and the international community to support the transition to a parliamentary democracy that reflects the true wishes of the Egyptian people and provide any cooperation needed to investigate the vast wealth reported to have been acquired by Hosni Mubarak and his family during his reign. Supported by: Marlyn Glen*, Joe FitzPatrick*
S3M-7946 Congratulations to the Egyptian People (lodged on 15 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*
S3M-7946 Congratulations to the Egyptian People (lodged on 15 February 2011) Linda Fabiani*
S3M-7946 Congratulations to the Egyptian People (lodged on 15 February 2011) Peter Peacock*
S3M-7946 Congratulations to the Egyptian People (lodged on 15 February 2011) Rhoda Grant*

S3M-7946 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to the Egyptian People—That the Parliament congratulates the Egyptian people on what it sees as their bravery in bringing an end to the 30-year Mubarak regime and their fight for democracy, freedom of expression and an improvement to their daily life and calls on Britain and the international community to support the transition to a parliamentary democracy that reflects the true wishes of the Egyptian people and provide any cooperation needed to investigate the vast wealth reported to have been acquired by Hosni Mubarak and his family during his reign. Supported by: Marlyn Glen, Joe FitzPatrick, Jamie Hepburn, Linda Fabiani, Peter Peacock, Rhoda Grant
